name: tadpoledbhub
description:
Tadpole DB Hub is Unified infrastructure tool, various environment based interface for managing Altibase, Apache Hive, Amazon RDS, MySQL, Oracle, SQLite, MSSQL, PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases.
Documentation is available at: https://github.com/dcos/examples/.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production!
postInstallNotes: Tadpole DB Hub has been installed.
postUninstallNotes: Tadpole DB Hub has been uninstalled.
